Steps.StepString: Access the provided URL using a web browser

Substeps.SubstepString: Enter the provided URL in the address bar.

Steps.StepString: The URL leads to a file containing the flag

Substeps.SubstepString: Follow the URL redirection (if applicable) to the file location.

Steps.StepString: Display the contents of the file to retrieve the flag.

Substeps.SubstepString: Open the file using an appropriate application or viewer.
Read and retrieve the flag from the displayed contents.
